entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
